name: Braintree
copyright: Copyright Â© Braintree, a division of PayPal, Inc. 2018

packOptions.releaseNotes:
* Add support for `association_filter_id` in `Customer#find`
* Add support for `OAUTH_ACCESS_REVOKED` in `WebhookNotification`s
* Add support for US Bank Account verifications via `PaymentMethod#create`, `PaymentMethod#update`, and `Transaction#create`
* Add support for US Bank Account verification search
packOptions.summary:
The Braintree .NET Client Library will allow you to take payments securely for
    your application, especially when paired with a Javascript(browser) or Android/Apple(mobile app)
    frontend. This app offers an SDK for all payment-centric calls to your Braintree account.
